Internationalization is provided by the gettext library. All translations can be found in _priv/po. To make a string translatable use the __() function. For example:

$local = __("Hello World");

To mark strings for translation without actually translating them yet use the #N_ function.

To update the translation files execute make update-po in the _priv/po directory. Then add the translations to the updated .po files. To install the new translations simply execute make install in the _priv/po directory.

Add files that need translation to _priv/po/POTFILES
